message.content:
Sure, here is a sample meal plan for you for the week:

Breakfast:
- Oatmeal with berries and cinnamon
- Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes
- Smoothie made with almond milk, banana, spinach, and protein powder

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing
- Quinoa bowl with black beans, roasted sweet potato, avocado, and salsa
- Vegetable stir-fry with tofu and brown rice

Dinner:
- Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, and Brussels sprouts) and quinoa
- Turkey chili with black beans and brown rice
- Lentil soup with carrots and celery

Snacks:
- Apples with almond butter
- Roasted chickpeas
- Carrot sticks with hummus
- Hard-boiled eggs

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust the portions according to your individual needs. You can also experiment with different recipes and ingredients to keep things interesting. If you have any specific dietary restrictions or preferences, feel free to let me know and I can help you find alternatives. Good luck with your healthy eating journey!
